title: Literary Argument - response to cultural collision

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze the character’s response and how it contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze the character’s response and how it contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
